title: STAT+: Nature Medicine to investigate  study that found cancer treatment is better in morning
description: Nature Medicine starts an investigation into inconsistencies in a study that found it was better to have immunotherapy in the morning.
content: Nature Medicine starts an investigation into inconsistencies in a study that found it was better to have immunotherapy in the morning.
